description: Break down ReportExport.tsx (1,004 LOC) into focused, reusable sub-components with proper separation of concerns

workstreams.description: Create planning documents and directory structure
crossAgentReferences: Follows component refactoring patterns from BDM701

workstreams.description: Extract types, utils, and hooks into separate files
Create focused UI components (FormatSelector, ExportScheduler, etc.)
Update main component and verify all imports/exports

decisions.decision: Use unique ID RE789X to avoid conflicts with existing agent files in .temp directory
Create ReportExport subdirectory to organize 15+ new files (types, utils, hooks, and 11 components)
Extract types first to establish shared interfaces, then utils/hooks, then components
Break modal into separate CreateExportModal component for better reusability
Create display components (ConfigCard, JobTable, TemplateCard) for tab content separation
